abstract: Automakers are entering the heart of the traditional spring selling season with more momentum than a year ago, but still have work to do to entice buyers.
snippet: Automakers are entering the heart of the traditional spring selling season with more momentum than a year ago, but still have work to do to entice buyers.
lead_paragraph: DETROIT — Toyota and other carmakers are expected to offer more discounts at dealerships, perhaps as early as Tuesday, after April new-vehicle sales fell short of analysts’ expectations.

headline.main: Higher April Sales for Ford and G.M.
headline.print_headline: Auto Sales Rose in April but Fell Short of Forecasts, Signaling Incentives to Come
